General.Name: Mundoro Capital Inc
General.Description: Mundoro Capital Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of base and precious metal properties in Serbia, Bulgaria, and the United States. It primarily explores for gold and copper. Mundoro Capital Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1040 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4H1
